item.title: Teleporting

item.description:
@X_Fin_pker_X wrote:

gho5t:

…hmm… are all of your tele commands emotes or actual commands?

Uhh. i have this:

case 4140: TeleTo("Varrock"); break; case 4143: TeleTo("Lumby"); break; case 4146: TeleTo("Falador"); break; case 4150: TeleTo("Camelot"); break; case 6004: TeleTo("Ardougne"); break; case 6005: TeleTo("Watchtower"); break; case 29031: TeleTo("Trollheim"); break; case 14067:

And the teleing almost works, but the gfx and animation?.. :FF

EDITT:

[quote=“PaulT”]Hi Fin pker, bumping your posts is not allowed. Somebody will answer your question if you wait.

Paul.[/quote]

item.title: Teleporting
item.dc:creator: @X_Fin_pker_X X Fin pker X
item.description:
@X_Fin_pker_X wrote:

Varrock tele is only1 what I tried to make working:

[code] if (s == “Varrock”){
actionAmount++;
startAnimation(714);
stillgfx(111, 100, absY, absX, 0);
teleportToX = 3213;
teleportToY = 3424;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == "Falador"){
actionAmount++;
teleportToX = 2965;
teleportToY = 3379;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == "Lumby"){
actionAmount++;
teleportToX = 3222;
teleportToY = 3218;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == "Camelot"){
actionAmount++;
teleportToX = 2757;
teleportToY = 3478;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == "Ardougne"){
actionAmount++;
teleportToX = 2662;
teleportToY = 3305;
heightLevel = 0;
}

if (s == "Trollheim"){
actionAmount++;
teleportToX = 2890;
teleportToY = 3677;
heightLevel = 0;
}
updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true;
}[/code]

And now the problem is:
How I can set so when emote 714 ends, it starts enote 715.
And, how i set how long teleing tooks? Cuz now it just jumps to varrock and the gfx stays old position or… ehh…
better undertsand if try: (ham server)

BRONZESCAPE (All letters r big)
Pass: 123
IP: 5.108.172.116
